hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/bash export APP_VERSION=`cat ${WORKSPACE}/application.properties | awk -F"=" '/app.version/ {print $2}'` sed -e "s|$APP_VERSION|3.0.0_${BUILD_NUMBER}|" -i '' ${WORKSPACE}/application.properties echo "Replacing app.version in application.properties from $APP_VERSION to 3.0.0_${BUILD_NUMBER}"

#!/bin/bash echo "--- Deployment ID: ${BUILD_TAG} - ${BUILD_ID}
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "Deployment to devint by Jenkins
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "Component: oss_bar
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "OSS_BAR_HOME = ${OSS_BAR_HOME}" echo "OSS_BAR_CONFIG = ${OSS_BAR_CONFIG}" echo "OSS_BAR_LOG4J_CONFIG = ${OSS_BAR_LOG4J_CONFIG}" echo "OSS_BAR_CROWD_PROPERTIES = ${OSS_BAR_CROWD_PROPERTIES}" ls $OSS_BAR_HOME echo "Replacing contents from OSS_BAR_HOME with ./jenkins config files" rm -fr /opt/cvbuild/config/oss_bar/* cp -r ${WORKSPACE}/jenkins/* $OSS_BAR_HOME ls -alR $OSS_BAR_HOME echo "Showing config file content" echo "OSS_BAR_CONFIG" cat ${OSS_BAR_CONFIG} echo "" echo "OSS_BAR_CROWD_PROPERTIES" cat ${OSS_BAR_CROWD_PROPERTIES} echo "DB Rebuild: yes
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "URL For Deploy output: console
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "

" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log mv /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/devint.html /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/devint.tmp cat /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/devint.tmp > /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/devint.html rm /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/devint.tmp rm /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log

#!/bin/bash export VERSION="3.0.0_${BUILD_NUMBER}" export Component="oss_bar"; echo "Component - $Component" export DB_Rebuild="Yes"; echo "DB_Rebuild - $DB_Rebuild" export Version=${VERSION}; echo "Version - $Version" export Clear_Logs="Yes"; echo "Clear_Logs - $Clear_Logs" export DeployTarg="devint"; echo "DeployTarg - $DeployTarg" export DeployUser="Jenkins"; echo "DeployUser = $DeployUser" export BUILD_TAG echo "--- Deployment ID: ${BUILD_TAG} - ${BUILD_ID}
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "Deployment to $DeployTarg by $DeployUser
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "Component: $Component
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log cd /opt/build/scripts ./Single_Component_Deploy.sh $Component $DB_Rebuild $Version $Clear_Logs $DeployTarg $BUILD_TAG $DeployUser
